ESSENTIAL ELECTRONIC EXPOSURE

Turbine Platform, 8:00pm-2:00am
Brisbane Powerhouse, New Farm

Brought to you by:

In conjunction with:

TICKETS

You may use this order form to purchase advance tickets to 101 directly from Transmission Communications.

Tickets are also available at the Brisbane Powerhouse box office (Ph: 07 3358 8600), and through Rocking Horse Records (Ph: 07 3229 5360).

Pre-sold tickets are only $15.00 (or $13.00 for full time student, 4ZZZ and unemployed card holders) + booking fees (including GST), and will include a product (CD, 12", or Tape) of your choice from the available Trans:Com catalogue.

Tickets will be available on the night at these prices, but will not include the above offer. Tickets are also limited in number, so advance purchase is recommended.

EVENT DATA

ABC Radio National, through Tim Ritchie's Sound Quality program, will be conducting a live webcast of 101's performances. Click here to access ABC Radio National's web site where you will find a link to the event webcast and chat room site (or click here to access the webcast site directly).

Click here for Event location and access information

Contact Transmission Communications (Trans:Com) at:

  • Email: info@trans.com.au
  • Post: PO Box 6291, Fairfield Gardens, QLD 4103 Australia
  • Phone: +61-(0)7-38465405
  • To get on the 101/Trans:Com email news list, enter your email address below, then click the 'Join List' button. (Note: This facility is only used for Trans:Com release, event and similar announcements and can not be accessed by others.)

MEDIA INFORMATION

Media representatives wishing to attend 101 for interviews, reviews, etc, should contact us to secure your pass. See the Event Data section for contact details.
